text:
Compound | Sr. Engineer | San Francisco | NO REMOTE | ONSITE

Compound is an open-source software protocol for algorithmic, efficient Money Markets on the Ethereum blockchain.

We are looking for an experienced engineer to join our team of 7 including 4 engineers https://bit.ly/2yNyL3S

To make it easy for you to gain technical insight here's our whitepaper https://bit.ly/2EXCmSr We don't require experience with our tech stack, just ability, and interest, in learning. For more details on the role, check the description here https://compound.finance/jobs

Give Compound a try. We are live and on a mission to make Ethereum assets more efficient and productive. https://compound.finance/

Ping me directly if you or someone you know might be interested. I'd love to tell you more- Emily emily@compound.finance
